definitions.definition: The food and beverage a person or animal consumes.
definitions.example: The diet of the Giant Panda consists mainly of bamboo.

definitions.definition: A controlled regimen of food and drink, as to gain or lose weight or otherwise influence health.
(by extension) Any habitual intake or consumption.
definitions.example: He's been reading a steady diet of nonfiction for the last several years.

definitions.definition: To regulate the food of (someone); to put on a diet.
To modify one's food and beverage intake so as to decrease or increase body weight or influence health.
definitions.example: I've been dieting for six months, and have lost some weight.

definitions.definition: To eat; to take one's meals.
To cause to take food; to feed.
(usually capitalized as a proper noun) A council or assembly of leaders; a formal deliberative assembly.
definitions.example: They were given representation of some important diet committees.

definitions.definition: The proceedings under a criminal libel.
A clerical or ecclesiastical function in Scotland.
